data.description:
The fifth studio recorded single, written, sung and composed by Anuv Jain is here!

Now available on: JioSaavn / Spotify / Apple Music

JioSaavn: https://www.jiosaavn.com/album/alag-a...

Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/track/74kCar...

Apple Music: https://music.apple.com/in/album/alag...

It is a rarity to meet each other in a long distance relationship and when you finally do, the goodbyes can get pretty difficult. There's so much uncertainty and you do not know when you'll meet again. Alag Aasmaan talks about a similar story where the girl is leaving the guy's place and is traveling back to her house which is in a different city, under a different sky (hence the title).

For inquiries- anuvjain.work@gmail.com
Instagram- @anuvjain
Manager- aayushman@representmgmt.in

Music production by
Angad Singh Bahra
For inquiries: angadsinghbahra@gmail.com
Instagram- @angad_bahra
 
Recorded at Uneven Studios, Ludhiana

Illustration and Animation by Sachin Bhatt
For inquiries: sachinbhatt18@gmail.com
Instagram- @bhattchin


Lyrics:

Alag Aasmaan 

Nayi nahi hain yeh baatein wahi
Phir is modh par hum milein hain
Na jaane ab milenge hum kabhi
Toh ruk jao ik pal yahan pe

Yeh narm chadaron ki silvatein
Tujhe abhi bula rahin hain
Na jao duur insein yeh kahein 
Yeh sukoon kahan pe hai hasil?

Dil ko mere yeh hai pata
Ke milon ka yeh faasla hai
Alag Aasmaan bhi hai toh kya?
Yeh dil na manay

Yeh gaadiyon ki aisi daudh sa 
Tera bhi dil daudhta hai
Ha ja rahe ho duur tum toh kya?
Main hi toh dil ka musafir

Toh ik baar phir tu haske zara 
Dekh le meri in aankhon mein 
Main kaid kar loon har woh pal tera 
Teri yeh baatein 

Jo hain

Toh aur kya hai yeh baatein bata?
Kyun ab din bhi dhalta nahin yeh na ho toh?


Tum udhe ja rahe
Yeh aasmaan mein khidkiyon se dekh tu pahadon ko 
yoon chote se lagay
Hai kitne bade jo ho samne

Durr jo hai khade 
Unhe bhi ye humari zindagi 
yoon titliyon si choti choti si lage
Hai kitni badi nahi jaante

Khaali ghar tera
Yeh chabiyon ki goonj aise 
Tujhe dara rahi, tu darna nahi
Main hoon yahin par
 
Ab Alag Aasmaan hai
Aur hai zameen bhi kuch alag si 
Par miloge jab kabhi, toh dekhna tabhi
Main kuch alag nahi

Apple Music:  https://itunes.apple.com/album/id/1388... 

 iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/album/id13886...

Saavn: https://www.saavn.com/p/song/english/...

Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/music/a...

The first studio recorded single, written, sung and composed by Anuv Jain is here! 
Like, SHARE, Comment and Subscribe to the channel. 

For inquiries- anuvjain.work@gmail.com
Instagram- anuvjain

The Remix version of Party Favor by Billie Eilish

https://open.spotify.com/artist/5dLfd...

#Faasle #AdityaRikhari

Instagram-  

 / adityarikhari  

Illustration by WeWork Studios
Produced by MeloWine Productions
Author & Composer - Aditya Rikhari
Published by CollabX Productions

For inquiries- aditya@collabx.in

'Farq hai' depicts the double-faced disposition of society. The ditty talks about the dim view an individual possesses about themselves as a consequence of social evils like racial discrimination and classism. The despondency and inferiority complex is expressed in the form of a love song.

FOLLOW ME ON INSTAGRAM  -  

 / suzonnofficial  

Audio Credits
Written, Composed and Performed by Suzonn
Ukulele and Bass - Richard Sumer
Music Produced, Mixed and Mastered by Suzonn

Vocals recorded at Samannay Studio (Guwahati) by Bishnupriya Sharma
Ukulele recorded at Studio Octave (Haflong) by Vishal Rajiyung
Bass recorded at Marvin's Studio (Haflong) by Marvin Lahong

Video Credits
Story and Concept - Suzonn
Screenplay - Manash Kashyap
Direction - Saurabh Hazarika
Character Animation - Chiranjeet Das
Coloring and Background Animation - Writwika Nisha Saikia and Saurabh Hazarika
Editor - Saurabh Hazarika

Special thanks to Marvin Lahong and Athoi Pena

Enquiry - suzonnmusic@gmail.com

Lyrics
Main zameen tu asmaan 
Aur adhuri dastaan
Naate kaise jude.

Tu resham si pari
Mujhme kya hai saadgi
Raaste mude huwe.

Hum tum alag hai
Farq hai farq hai farq hai
Arz main tu falak hai
Farq hai farq hai farq hai.

Hmmmm.....

Naaz tu muzeer main
Zid pe ab lakeer hai
Beyhadh hai faasle.

Main shaamat ka nishaan
Tujhpe unko hai gumaan
Duniya mujhko sahe.

Main mohtaaj tu dhadak hai
Farq hai farq hai farq hai
Main berang tu chamak hai
Farq hai farq hai farq hai.

Hmmmm.....
